short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Absolute Screenshot Capturizer is a powerful browser extension for web developers, marketers, and content creators alike.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Absolute Screenshot Capturizer is a powerful browser extension that streamlines workflow for web developers, marketers, and content creators alike. With this extension, users can quickly view pages in a mobile, tablet, or desktop view, and easily edit page elements and take screenshots. The extension also supports a range of popular page formats, and allows users to create their own custom format. Additionally, the extension helps users quickly capture and save screenshots, making it easy to review changes and edits. For those who need to quickly make changes to websites or take screenshots, the Absolute Screenshot Capturizer chrome extension is a great choice. You can edit the text on a webpage before you capture it with this extension Using this extension, users are able to edit the text on a webpage before they capture it. This eliminates the need to re-edit the text later, saving time and resources. The ability to edit text on a webpage can be especially useful for businesses, who can ensure that the text they capture is accurate and consistent with their branding. This extension also ensures that users capture the edited version of the web page, which is especially important when dealing with dynamic webpages.
